info.description: This OpenAPI specification is automatically generated by Hasura.
info.title: Rest Endpoints

post.description:
***
The GraphQl query for this endpoint is:
``` graphql
mutation insert_shops_one($object: shops_insert_input!) {
  insert_shops_one(object: $object) {
    created_at
    default_tile_id
    deleted_at
    id
    is_live
    name
    organization_id
    saved_smart_shop
    source
    updated_at
  }
}

```
